pages.title: Black Mamba
pages.text: The black mamba ($(o)Dendroaspis polylepis$()) is a species of highly venomous snake belonging to the family Elapidae.$(br2)It is native to parts of sub-Saharan Africa.$(br2)Specimens of 4.3 to 4.5 m ($(o)14 ft 1 in to 14 ft 9 in$()) have been reported.$(br2)Its skin colour varies from grey to dark brown.

pages.title: Black Mamba
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:rabbit$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
